title: Spiced Butternut Squash
directions: Preheat oven to 400Â°F. Toss all ingredients in large bowl to coat. Arrange squash on large rimmed baking sheet. Bake until squash is tender and beginning to brown, stirring occasionally, about 45 minutes. Transfer squash to bowl.
ingredients: 4 pounds butternut squash, peeled, seeded, cut into 1-inch cubes
